abstract: Nikon’s D700, priced at $2,995, packs the considerable abilities of the company’s hefty $5,000 flagship, the D3, into a more svelte 2.2-pound device.
snippet: Nikon’s D700, priced at $2,995, packs the considerable abilities of the company’s hefty $5,000 flagship, the D3, into a more svelte 2.2-pound device.
lead_paragraph: This week, the latest salvo landed in the pitched battle between Nikon and Canon for the hearts, minds and wallets of serious photographers.

headline.main: Camera Packs Features at a Less-Hefty Price
headline.print_headline: Camera Packs Features at a Less-Hefty Price
